channel.title: Beth on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Beth on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Discovering desistance
item.description: CL - Claire Lightowler EW - Ewan B - Beth A - Archie EL - Elizabeth Claire Lightowler (Iriss) hosts a discussion at the second of two workshops held in Glasgow on 16 May 2012 as part of the Desistance Knowledge Exchange CL Shall we start just going around the table and introduce yourselves a little bit? EW I am Ewan B I am Beth A I am Archie EL I am Elizabeth
